description: Try our easy to follow Light & Creamy Chicken Carbonara recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Light & Creamy Chicken Carbonara Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Blend cornflour with 1/4 cup (60ml) evaporated milk. Add to frying pan with remaining milk, stirring constantly until the sauce boils and thickens, stirring, add pasta and baby spinach; toss through. Sprinkle with cheese. Serve immediately.
